faq.question: What am I actually purchasing?
faq.answer: You are purchasing a <mark>service</mark> where we provide you with a personalized configuration file and dedicated technical support to help you set up and access third-party digital media streams on your devices. <mark>We do not host, control, or own any content.</mark>

faq.question: Is this service legal?
faq.answer: Our configuration and support service is <mark>100% legal</mark>. It is the end-user's responsibility to ensure they have the rights to access the content they are viewing. We provide a technical means of access, but do not verify the copyright status of third-party streams.

faq.question: What happens after I pay?
faq.answer: After a successful payment, you will receive an email within 24 hours containing your unique <mark>configuration file</mark> and simple, step-by-step instructions for all major devices. Our support team is available if you need any help.

faq.question: Do I need a VPN?
faq.answer: For your <mark>privacy and security</mark>, and to bypass any potential geo-restrictions on content, we always <mark>highly recommend using a trusted VPN service</mark>. Our configurations are fully compatible with all major VPNs.
